name: StrutYourStuff
0:
”Alexa, strut your stuff”
”Alexa, ask strut your stuff for menu”
”Demonstrate whisper”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: strut your stuff
des:
This is a skill designed to let you play around with Alexa and hear a few tricks she has up her virtual sleeves. Simply ask Alexa to "Strut Your Stuff" and she'll show off one of her talents at random. You can also choose a particular talent by saying, "ask Strut Your Stuff to demonstrate (name of talent)" substituting the name of one of her talents such as Falling, Gibberish, Interjections, Jabberwocky, Rooster, Sheldon, or Whisper. There are a few others. See if you can guess their names.

If you ask for a Menu, you'll get a message explaining how to get Alexa to perform a specific talent. Check your Alexa app for a written version of the instructions.

That's it, at least for now. Have fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
